column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'm no expert.  In fact
column2: this was my first EVER experience with deep dish
column3: which is why I'm so disappointed that it was bad.  We read every review and weighed about 5 different pizza places
column4: ultimately narrowing it down to Lou Malnati's and Giordano's.  We picked Lou's because everyone said to.  We called up friends who are from Chicago
column5: we read reviews that said that Chicago natives all seem to prefer Lou's.
